description:
Facebook is consider one of the main social networking services where large numbers of people spend most of their time. You might have undoubtedly heard of this social network if you are one of its 500 million followers from all over the world. The enormous number of fan following allows Facebook to offer you an opportunity to make money online on Facebook in an interestingly easier way.

In this course you will learn all facebook features starting with basic to advanced level. In addition, you will lean how to create your own facebook group page and facebook fun page. At the end of this course you will learn ways to get money from facebook starting with creating your own business ads and marketing your product or customer product.
title: Facebook Marketing for All Levels: Create Ads & Pages
